definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Hu Shi's value system of scientific education was characterized by pure science.
sentences.chinese: 胡適的科學教育價值觀是以惟科學主義爲特徵的。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Nietzsche was firmly against Scientism.
sentences.chinese: 但是，尼采堅決反對唯科學主義。

sentences.english: Scientism is a major part of modem western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 科學主義是現代西方兩大哲學思潮之一。

sentences.english: These victories has also produced the viewpoints of Scientism.
sentences.chinese: 這些勝利也催生了唯科學主義的觀點。

sentences.english: Scientism is a social thought that takes science as only and tiptop standard.
sentences.chinese: 科學主義是一種視科學爲唯一與最高標準的社會思潮。
